advancements.mixedbag.riding_crop.descri: Use a riding crop on a mount
advancements.mixedbag.riding_crop_potion: Achieve a higher than usual speed on a mount by applying a swiftness potion with a riding crop
advancements.mixedbag.sickle_block.title: Git Gud
advancements.mixedbag.sickle_block.descr: Successfully nullify (most of) creeper's explosion with a sickle
advancements.mixedbag.sickle_sweeping_ed: Increase sickle's sweep attack damage by enchanting it with sweeping edge

advancements.mixedbag.sickle_use.descrip: Perform a charged dash attack with a Sickle
advancements.mixedbag.sickle_stack_damag: Deal at least 18 hearts of damage to one entity with a single sickle sweep
advancements.mixedbag.morbid_sweep.title: Morbid sweep
advancements.mixedbag.morbid_sweep.descr: Deal like really a lot of damage across multiple entities with a single sickle sweep
advancements.mixedbag.undead_mayhem.desc: Use a riding crop on all undead mounts
advancements.mixedbag.mending_resin.desc: Transform resin clump into mending resin with a sculk catalyst and use it to repair your equipment

advancements.mixedbag.tough_flesh.descri: Smelt a piece of rotten flesh and craft leather out of it

fortune.mixedbag.3: "The number 3 is very important in your life right now."
fortune.mixedbag.4: "You have been chosen. They will come soon."
fortune.mixedbag.5: "Pleasant things can happen on rainy days too."
fortune.mixedbag.9: "Make molten pickaxe by pressing Q near lava!"
fortune.mixedbag.14: "Eating is the sole privilege of the living."
fortune.mixedbag.18: "When life gives you citrine, make ametrine!"
